description:
The Goldeen that stay at the Cerulean City gym most likely belong to the gym`s former owners, Misty`s three sisters. Their only appearance was made in the episode The Misty Mermaid.
During this episode they only played background roles and didn`t contribute much, if anything to the episode. They haven`t been featured in any other following episodes since and most likely remain at the Cerulean City gym.
name: Tosakinto (Hanada Gym)
